channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Display Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Display Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-28047|2024-08-02T12:30:22.698Z -- dell -- dell%20display%20manager
item.description: Dell Display Manager, versions 2.1.0 and prior, contains an arbitrary file or folder creation vulnerability during installation. A local low privilege attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the execution of arbitrary code on the operating system with high privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-28046|2024-08-02T12:30:22.686Z -- dell -- dell%20display%20manager
item.description: Dell Display Manager, versions 2.1.0 and prior, contains an arbitrary file or folder deletion vulnerability during uninstallation A local low privilege attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to the deletion of arbitrary files on the operating system with high privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-32474|2024-02-06T07:53:22.515Z -- dell -- dell%20display%20manager
item.description: Dell Display Manager application, version 2.1.1.17 and prior, contain an insecure operation on windows junction/mount point. A local malicious user could potentially exploit this vulnerability during installation leading to arbitrary folder or file deletion

item.title: CVE-2023-32451|2024-02-06T07:46:27.135Z -- dell -- dell%20display%20manager
item.description: Dell Display Manager application, version 2.1.1.17, contains a vulnerability that low privilege user can execute malicious code during installation and uninstallation

item.title: CVE-2023-32474|2024-07-05T17:21:29.673Z -- dell -- dell%20display%20manager
item.description: Dell Display Manager application, version 2.1.1.17 and prior, contain an insecure operation on windows junction/mount point. A local malicious user could potentially exploit this vulnerability during installation leading to arbitrary folder or file deletion
